title: See you at the movies
text: This is a React project where I used Bootstrap for layout and Hooks to manage state. With this project I realized why nested ternary opertators is an anti-pattern and I tried to ways to avoid it and still achieve the results I wanted in JSX.

title: Vanilla jobs
text: This project's goal was to practice React and state management and component lifecicle methods through class based components as well as mobile first design. (break) You can login using a test account: maintester@tester.com - password: maintester

title: Star wars planets
text: On this project, I focused on practicing Typescript with React. It's one of the most challenging projects I have had, not for it's size but for all the things I have done and tried for the first time, which includes styled components.

title: Flamewisher
text: This was my first large project using NodeJS and Express as well as Handlebars. It helped me understanding HTTP requests, and gave me the foundation to later understand REST APIs and MVC patterns. (break) You can login using a test account: maintester@tester.com - password: maintester
